Please try again Oh ho! Resume You have completed today\'s practice!\nKeep practicing every day! अपनी मानव सम्पदा ID पंजीकृत करें Assessment Home Screen Start practicing. Student assessment Teacher Assessment Summary Examiner assessment summary Summary of all school assessments Start the assessment. Assess! Mentor Profile Teacher Profile Assessment Overview Knowledge section Spot Assessment Name : \u0020\u0020%s Teacher Name : \u0020\u0020%s Designation : \u0020\u0020%s UDISE : \u0020\u0020%s District : \u0020\u0020%s Block : \u0020\u0020%s Cancel Yes Logout Change Language Coming soon! Start practice session Not now Are you sure you want to log out? Help Section Profile Verify pin //Schools selection screen Search for School UDISE Code Rural Urban Select school to start visit Leave visited schools //workflow strings %s result According to success target Assessment Please Select class for Assessment Choose subjects for assessment\n(Only one subject can be chosen at a time) Selected Grade and Subject Choose Another School How many students do you want to assess? The evaluation is about to begin. Is the student sitting in front of you? "%d correct word "%d words read correctly (per minute) Great %s, let\'s move on! "%d%% is the correct answer" Score Card Assessment Ended Now test the next student Share this score card screenshot with your teacher to motivate students Start another assessment Go to the home screen. Words read correctly\n(per minute) Correct answers to the questions You completed the assessment of ‘%s’ students You have completed the assessment for student ‘%s’ Submit Result Visited Not\nVisited School :\u0020 School :\u0020%s District :\u0020%s Block :\u0020%s UDISE : \u0020 UDISE :\u0020%s %s Mins %s Min Min Please choose efficiency first Competency Students Assessment Canceled Total time: %s Subject Related Instructions Assessment\nFinish Data did not sync, please try again later. Data synced successfully! Data will sync in the background Sync the data Assessments completed in class 1 Assessments completed in class 2 Assessments completed in class 3 CLASS WISE OVERVIEW Completed School Assessments Assessment Overview Students Completed Assessments Average time per assessment Data is already synced PLEASE PAY ATTENTION There is data to sync on your app. We\'ll sync your data and log you out Not completed Teacher Mentor, Teacher, Examiner Instructions for mentors:\n \nThis assessment will be done through the \'Read Along\' app. Some words or stories will be shown as you proceed, please ask the student to read them. Enter registered mobile number Number not registered? Guardian Mentor Now this student needs more hard work and continuous practice Please have the student practice the competencies through list practice. Spot Assessment Overview Summary based on observation Week Select Week Upload Data Reports Monthly Reports Visit-Wise Reports Helpline form Privacy Policy Please select your profile Select district and block to start the evaluation process Privacy Policy - Nipun Lakshya App Nipun Lakshya Nipun Abhyas Nipun Suchi\n(Weekly) Study list The exercise is going to take place on these targets Students are going to be assessed on the following competencies Assess language and math proficiency goals together Please select the options given first. Please select district and block first Share the screenshot of the score card that appears on the next screen with the teacher wrong Correct Nipun Not Nipun Nipun Lakshya : Class Update available A new version of Nipun Lakshya application is available on playstore. Please update the app to proceed. Update LowOnSpaceException On what basis do you want to assess the student? Proficient Student Nipun Student Do you want to proceed with assessment of another student? Start Assessment District Block Judicial Panchayat Mathematics Language Go ahead School List Travel Status कक्षा Start Over हाँ नहीं Please select district first Please select first block January February March April May June July August September October November December ► Data Save Failed! Section A Section B Section C Section D Section E Section F Examiner Profile What observation are you going to make? Spot Assessment \n (During Supportive Supervision) State-Led Assessment Diet Mentor Profile Diet Mentor Profile This student is Nipun This student is not nipun The examiner starts assessing 10 students. \nIf 10 students are not present then you can start again for the remaining students. Test the next student End Test Note-DIET mentor supportive supervision में पहला विकल्प का चयन करें |\n आगामी मूल्यांकन अभियान में State Led Assessment का चयन करा जायगा | Please enter %s please select %s Please enter valid %s Hello! An unexpected technical problem has occurred. Please restart the app. No District found, please wait while this is corrected. Please sync data. Practice for the next student. Start Suchi Abhyas for next student Congratulations, your student has achieved the Math and Language Proficiency target for grade %s. Finish the assessment. 1. If you want to assess students on a mastery goal, select Mastery Practice.
2. If you would like to assess students on weekly guide based competencies, please select List Practice. Please answer all the given questions before starting the assessment Data is not synced. Please try again. \nIf any problem occurs please inform DCT and helpline number. Choose Read the paragraph at a rate of %s words per minute Read %s words of paragraph UP Education Bot Other classes– Bhalvatika, 4–8 OK "We are preparing the app for you. Please wait." Go ahead. To use the app you must click on the checkbox to accept the terms and conditions of the privacy policy. Could not start app as Form Module couldn\'t be initialised properly. Choose School "Nipun Lakshya App" Your observations are based on %s month Practice Session Nipun Students Today This week Practice Subject Please select from the options below to get started. Chatbot launcher Please Enter Pin Expert Assistant\nChat Bot Network error Competencies or chapters will be added soon! You are away from school. You are outside the scope of school. Please start the assessment within the school. If you are inside the school, contact VSK helpline on 05223538777. Please turn on location to rate! Please start evaluation. Your location is being matched with the school location. Question Student Turn on location! Allow location! Please allow location to rate! settings >> permission >> location >> allow 0522–3538777 Udise is null Call or try again Please Select A Class Class 1 Class 2 Class January February March April May June July August September October November December Assessment question paper is loading, Please wait.
